de.esoco.ewt.impl.gwt.material.layout

Class MaterialLayoutFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.ewt.layout.DefaultLayoutFactory
      • de.esoco.ewt.impl.gwt.material.layout.MaterialLayoutFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.ewt.layout.LayoutFactory, de.esoco.ewt.layout.LayoutMapper

    public class MaterialLayoutFactory
extends de.esoco.ewt.layout.DefaultLayoutFactory
implements de.esoco.ewt.layout.LayoutMapper
    A factory and mapper that creates layouts or maps GEWT layouts to new layouts that are based on GwtMaterialDesign widgets.
